amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $3 million earmark for the Consortium for Plant Biotechnology Research.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part C of House Report 111-209 to strike $1 million in funding for the `Consortium for Plant Biotechnology Research' and reduce the overall cost of the bill by a commensurate amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 89 - 335 (Roll no. 583).
